html: 1.13.18  8:34 pm   have u ever invented anything?

1.13.18  8:01 pm   People ask you how to get motivated to do stuff, and you often ask them why they have to do the thing. It seems simple - "just answer the question, and that answer is the thing that motivates you" - but that's not the problem. I know why I need to do it. I know that doing the thing, whatever it is, is the most logically, emotionally, and/or spiritually satifying thing I can do right now, the thing I'll look back on and say "I'm glad I did that thing." It is the best thing to do in every regard, except one: doing the thing will make the right now go from being okay to feeling sucky, and that just sets the rest of my brain in a tizzy, and I try to fight against it but my inner fatass always wins. So, Bill Wurtz, I ask you, how do I garner the mental power to stop my griping and groaning and just do the sucky thing already?

1.13.18  7:53 pm   I don't know what to do. I'm depressed with school and my life in general- it's mainly because of school. I love playing video games, listening to music, writing and watching YouTube but I also want to be a musician or an artist. A creator of something. To me, these things are all very important to me. They inspire me and make me happy. But I can't stand this path anymore. It makes me sad. The people that surround me kind of kill my creative aspirations in life. I want to do these great things that I dream of everyday. I just don't know where to start. I don't know where to go with all the people that surround me deterring me of my dreams and creativity. Any advice or suggestions for me? I'd appreciate it. -T

1.13.18  7:51 pm   if something is your favorite, that means that it is the thing you prefer. it does not mean that that thing is better than the other things, it's just the one that you prefer. for example, my favorite fruit is the apple. if I walk into a fruit store and the shopkeeper asks me what I would like, I would say "give me an apple, please". perhaps the next person in line might prefer a grapefruit, or a plum, or a banana.. and that is just fine. but I would prefer an apple over a grapefruit, plum, or banana. that doesn't mean that the apple is better than those fruits.... that being said.... what is your favorite band?

1.13.18  9:14 am   What are you thoughts on 'internet humor'?

      Like the whole "lolz omg so random XD" stuff or the silly writing (like "boi" or "pl0x halp" or "why you no do this?" etc), or all the meme-quoting and referencing, and the whacky stuff that you see in youtube or instagram and other social media comments... do you think people will look back on this humor style one day and just be like... 'what the fuck'? I'm trying to imagine one of my grandparents reading the comment section of a viral youtube video, and I feel like it would be like reading a foreign language to them.
